name: Hentrio
description: Hentrio is a 2D pixel art style platform game in which we control a female warrior. Its subject is in the period when women are overly dominant over men. We will have to destroy the enemies that will come before us to defeat the guards and those guards put at the head of our main enemy named Valeria. Demo version has 2 skills and dodge mechanics in the skill tree. Good games. #platformer #adventure #action #2d #pixelart #skills
